name: SUPERMOON
description:
SUPERMOON

    Spaceship shooter that I made to test some ideas. You follow an astronaut trying to protect the moon.

Layout  (Keyboard):

  • WASD/ Arrow key/4568 - Movement
  • Z - Shooting
  • X - Special

Layout  (Controller):

  • Left trigger - Movement
  • A  - Shooting
  • X - Special

(Download: Must extract in a different folder. )

Game by thom thom, Music by Lala-po
